data.event: Attempt to recover stolen items results in fatal stabbing . He found the men early Saturday in Independence, but during an ensuing struggle, the 48-year-old Kansas City man was fatally stabbed in the back.

event.title: charged an Independence teenager on Monday

data.event: Jackson County prosecutors charged an Independence teenager on Monday with killing Welch and another teen with the stealing that led to Saturday’s fatal confrontation.
Jackson County prosecutors charged an Independence teenager on Monday with killing Welch and another teen with the stealing that led to Saturday’s fatal confrontation.

event.title: went to a residence in the 300 block of East Elm Street about 1:45 a.m. Saturday

data.event: According to court documents, Welch went to a residence in the 300 block of East Elm Street about 1:45 a.m. Saturday and got into a fight with 19-year-old Anthony Gillen of Kansas City.
